task_description: Integrate iOS 26 Vision framework capabilities into SwiftWing camera system for real-time on-device intelligence: (1) Real-time text recognition overlay during live camera preview, (2) On-device ISBN barcode detection, (3) Smart capture guidance with object detection, (4) Physical button capture via AVCaptureEventInteraction. Foundation: existing AVFoundation setup in CameraManager actor, target Epic 5 (Refactoring/Polish phase).
